i walked into the store and everyone seemed to be on lunch no one greeted me or offered help even after i told the associate that i was not sure what size in what i was looking for when i finally did get someone to help me they were rushed and basically left me on my own i get retail could be busy and i was willing to let the bad service go until i saw someone getting much better service they fitted her and everything i am not sure if it was because she was younger or had the complexion connection but i did not like that i did not receive the same level of service i am still willing to shop to lane bryant but i think i will suck it up and go out to jersey or brooklyn next time.
